Description: GO TO THE KITCHEN .TAKE A MUG /PLACE IT IN FRONT OF COFFEE MACHINE . PRESS THE BUTTON COFFEE .
GO TO THE KITCHEN . SEE THE SINK . WASH ALL THE DIRTY PLATES AND BOWLS IN THE SINK
GO TO THE KITCHEN . TAKE A KNIFE AND PLATE. NOW TAKE THE APPLE. CUT THE APPLE INTO THIN SLICES USING THE KNIFE
GO TO THE KITCHEN . TAKE A BREAD .PUT IT IN A TOASTER. ON THE TOASTER SWITCH .THE BREAD WILL BE TOASTED AUTOMATICALLY
GO TO THE KITCHEN .TAKE A FRYING PAN IN THE KITCHEN . TAKE EGG FROM THE FRIDGE. NOW KEEP THE FRYING PAN IN GASBURNER /BREAK THE EGG AND PUT IT IN THE PAN .TAKE A SPOON AND FRY IT.
Collect all the things to make tomato soup and goto kitchen area. Then prepare the tomato soup

Locate lettuce in room. Locate knife in room. Use knife to cut lettuce into small pieces. Locate pot. Place lettuce pieces into pot. Carry pot to sink. Place pot under faucet. Turn on faucet and fill pot with water. Carry pot to stove. Place pot on stove. Turn on gasburner. Use spoon to stir contents of pot occasionally. Cook to desired doneness.
GO TO THE KITCHEN . TAKE A POT. POUR THE WATER IN THE POT .ON THE GASBURNER . ADJUST THE STOVEKNOB RANGE. NOW BOIL THE WATER.
Located cracked egg. Carry cracked egg to bin. Place cracked egg inside bin.
Move to fridge. Open door of fridge. Remove contents of fridge.
Find the potato. Find the plate. Place the potato on the plate. Locate the knife and cut the potato into slices. Take the plate and place it in the microwave. Turn on the microwave.
Locate the wine bottle. Open the win bottle. Locate the cup. Pour wine from the wine bottle into the cup.
Open the fridge. Locate the potato, tomato, lettuce and bread. Place the potato, tomato, lettuce and bread in the fridge. Close the fridge.
Turn on the faucet. Locate the cup. Fill the cup with water from the sink faucet.

Turn in the stove range. Turn on the faucet. Locate the pot. Fill the pot with water from the faucet. Place the pot on the stove range. Locate the potato. Place the potato into the pot. Boil the potato.
Locate the unused apple slices. Place the unused apple slices in the bin.
Locate the knife and any other kitchen utensil that is on a counter or table. Open the drawer. Place the utensils in the drawer.

Description: Locate the cup with coffee in it. Take the cup and pour our the coffee in the sink basin.
Take the pot from the stove range. Pour the water from the pot into the sink basin.
Locate the light switch. Turn the light switch to the off position.
